answers.answer: You should go in to get checked. Sounds like could be preeclampsia

It can happen without it being preeclampsia.  Def check with your dr to rule it out though. My fingers and get get super swollen whenever I over due it. Walk to much or don't get off my feet enough.  Try to take a break.

question: 34 weeks and i have places on my body that i didnt even know could hurt so much! I cant make a tight fist because my knuckles and fingures r so swullen. You know your fingur normally is big by the knuckle and gets smaller as you go to the finger tip? Mine doesnt! I have super big sausage fingers. I havent had salt so idk what my bodys issue is. My feet look like they. Belong to a 400 poumd woman lol! I cant lay on my back to put them up cuz then im winded. June 13th NEEDS TO HURRY
